title: Graph of deriv., areas given part - b

content.description: The figure above shows the graph of f' the derivative of a twice-differentiable function f, on the closed interval 0 ≤ x ≤ 8 . The graph of f' has horizontal tangent lines at x=1, x=3, and x=5. The areas of the regions between the graph of f' and the x-axis are labeled in the figure. The function f is defined for all real numbers and satisfied f(8)=4.
content.question: Determine the absolute minimum value of f on the closed interval 0 ≤ x ≤ 8 . Justify your answer.

frqParts.text: Determine the absolute minimum value of f on the closed interval 0 ≤ x ≤ 8 . Justify your answer.

topic.text: 5.5: Using the Candidates Test to Determine Absolute (Global) Extrema

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
